pages.text: Affects fury spells only. Doubles Fury XP gained on spell-cast, increases fury spell level by 1, and adds 0.4 flat damage. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter blazes with your rage and anger. Manifests on the Equinox when you complete the Furious Path of the Equinox.
